t: I Blind-Tasted 9 Ketchup Brands—and the Winner Will Surprise You
s: We blind-tasted nine different ketchups to determine which brands we’d buy again. And, I’m sorry to say Pittsburgh, you’re not going to be happy. Each ketchup was tested on its own, then on a crinkle-cut French fry. I was looking for the best-tasting ketchup with the perfect flavor and texture. A good ketchup should have a salty, umami flavor with a hint of sweetness from the tomatoes...
